content.introduction: The variable 'varname' is used both as a parameter and as destination in s[n]printf(). The origin and destination buffers overlap. Quote from glibc (C-library) documentation (http://www.gnu.org/software/libc/manual/html_mono/libc.html#Formatted-Output-Functions): "If copying takes place between objects that overlap as a result of a call to sprintf() or snprintf(), the results are undefined."
